Name: China
Description: Most populous country in the world, known for its ancient history, culture, and rapid economic growth.

Name: India
Description: Second most populous country, known for its rich history, culture, and economic influence.

Name: Indonesia
Description: Southeast Asian archipelago, known for its diverse cultures, languages, and rich biodiversity.

Name: Pakistan
Description: South Asian country known for its historical sites, diverse culture, and strategic location.

Name: Bangladesh
Description: South Asian country known for its dense population and historical landmarks.

Name: Japan
Description: Island nation known for its advanced technology, culture, and historical landmarks.

Name: Russia
Description: Transcontinental country spanning Europe and Asia, known for its rich cultural heritage and vast size.

Name: South Korea
Description: Known for its advanced technology, vibrant culture, and rich history.

Name: Thailand
Description: Southeast Asian country known for its tropical beaches, temples, and vibrant culture.

Name: Vietnam
Description: Southeast Asian country known for its history, beaches, and cultural heritage.
